title: The Delivery
coldOpens: Dwight insists Jim and Pam are using their upcoming baby to increase their sales. They advise Dwight to open up to his clients about his personal life, to shocking results.

quotes.speaker: Dwight Schrute
quotes.content: "I need a baby. I'll never outsell Jim and Pam without one. Also, I've been noticing a gaping hole in my life. Sometimes I wake up cradling a gourd."

quotes.speaker: Pam Beesly
quotes.content: "Ok, ok, we are not going the hospital, we are waiting until midnight."

quotes.speaker: Jim Halpert
quotes.content: "Because, the insurance company only covers two nights."

quotes.speaker: Pam Beesly
quotes.content: "Everything's fine. We've got plenty of time."

quotes.speaker: Nick
quotes.content: "Well, you don't wanna wait too long Pam. Otherwise the baby's going to become a teenager in there and uh you'll be up all night. From, the rock music."

quotes.speaker: Michael Scott
quotes.content: Shut up, Nick! God. Weird thing to say. Weird IT Nerd. Don't get revenge on me nerd.
[give an innocent scoff and looks for support]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.content: (To everybody) Should I bring a dictionary to the hospital?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.content: The hospital will provide dictionaries, bring a thesaurus!
